name: EBOLA.VI.CORP
description:
After the war ended on April 4, 2048, few survived. For the first time in history, the most dangerous biological weapons were used. On the first day, most of the planet was destroyed, for the rest the central nervous system was destroyed by an incomprehensible virus that infected everyone. In the first stage, the cerebral cortex was destroyed. She is known to be responsible for thinking and what separates us from animals. The virus feeds exclusively on astrocytes, which are found in the brain. That's why every second zombie will try to kill you at every level. You will have the opportunity to fight back. In your arsenal there is a PISTOL, AUTOMATIC MACHINE and a PULMET, shoot continuously or in bursts, deceive the zombies and set a goal - SURVIVE. These zombies, unlike ordinary ones, maintain homeostasis with a high concentration of light irradiation. Let's remove the light and destroy the virus. At each level you have to perform special tasks, remove the light from the map, kill the zombies. Also sometimes dangerous creatures appear. Be careful with them. Pump and kill crowds of zombies. LIVE! Let it be tin!

Control: WASD - walking, [1] / [2] - change weapons.

Features:
- progress;
- nice graphics;
- simple operation;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
- availability in 2 languages.
